resources.string: Warning:All your products,catagories,\n orders wiil be permanently deleted.
I accept and want to continue.
Pay in cash or pay in person at the time of\n delivery with Gpay/PayTm/PhonePe
it will make this filed as a mandatory field and\n customer won\'t be able to skip it
Product views shows many\npeople have checked out your\n individual products/services
Store views numbers shows how\nmany pepole have visited your store\n on the internet/services
You will receive a confirmation message \nshortly.For more details,check orders \nstatus on your WhatsApp
